data.title: Academic Instructor
description: • Provide private session for students every week on calendly
• Collect learning progress report of each students in every phase
• Research, analyze, and update material curriculum plan of Frontend Engineering
• Delivering fundamental of Backend Engineering with Express JS in Thrive Program

data.title: Frontend Engineering Instructor
description: • Provide basic programming knowledge of Javascript with library such as React Js
• Develop and create material curriculum about fundamental knowledge of React Js
• Manage telegram group for students discussion or QnA session
• Collecting weekly evaluation of students progress with helpdesk team

data.title: Mobile Application Developer
description: • Responsible for handle 3 Mobile App development such as IJSL (Indonesian Junior Soccer League), Birdie App, Fresh Express App
• Responsible to perform mobile app integration with backend as services such as Firebase, Firestore, etc.
• Manage and monitor progress across all mobile application projects
• Manage and fix some configuration issues, setup, or bugs during the software development process until production
• Responsible for testing and deploy to playstore or appstore on projects that have been completed
• Integrate mobile app with Woo-Commerce and Midtrans payment gateway
• Implement Redux as global state management with Redux-Thunk middleware for development process

data.title: Mobile Application Developer
description: • Responsible for handling 'Rocket' mobile app development with React Native Typescript
• Maintain code, debugging, and fixing bug
• Integrating mobile app with third-party API from vendors
• Participate in weekly meetings with Management Team to discuss new features that can increase users engagement
• Create MVP, Business Model, and Product flow system (wireframe)
• Create Bussiness Requirement Document (BRD), A/B Testing
• Work closely with the digital marketing team to research competitors product
• Analyze mutual fund mobile application market to determine user needs
